<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Water Bomb](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1517)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Quest for the Frozen Flame</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Nonlethal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=188" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
<trait label="Water" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=165" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 79</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This bladder of water explodes when put under pressure or upon being punctured, dealing minimal damage, neutralizing acids, and dousing flames. A water bomb deals the listed bludgeoning damage and bludgeoning [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage. On a hit, if the target is suffering from [persistent acid or persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29), it can attempt a flat check to end that persistent damage immediately. As this is particularly effective assistance, the DC of the flat check is reduced from 15 to 10 for this check. On a hit against an unattended, non-magical fire, the bomb extinguishes the fire, or extinguishes one square of fire for a larger fire. Many types grant an item bonus to attack rolls, and some types extinguish wider areas of fire.

</column>

</row>

</column>

---

The bomb deals 1 nonlethal bludgeoning damage and 1 nonlethal bludgeoning splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 3"
pfs=""
>
Water Bomb (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 79</row>

**Price** 10 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 1d4 nonlethal bludgeoning damage and 2 nonlethal bludgeoning splash damage.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 11"
pfs=""
>
Water Bomb (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #176: Lost Mammoth Valley](/Sources.aspx?ID=113) pg. 79</row>

**Price** 250 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 2d4 nonlethal bludgeoning damage and 3 nonlethal bludgeoning splash damage. Except on a critical failure, the bomb extinguishes non-magical fires within its splash area.

level="2"
right="Item 17"
pfs=""
>

</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 3d4 nonlethal bludgeoning damage and 4 nonlethal bludgeoning splash damage. Except on a critical failure, the bomb extinguishes nonmagical fires within its splash area.
